question: Which team bagged the 9th National Ice Hockey Championship, 2020 title?
explanation:
At the 9th National Ice Hockey Championship recently held, the Indian Army Red team lifted the National Championship title. They defeated the Indo Tibetan Border Police team in the hard-fought final to bag the title.
The Army Red team had players from the Ladakh Scouts Regiment. 12 teams including Maharashtra, Haryana, Ladakh, Chandigarh, ITBP and the Army participated in the Ice Hockey Association of India (IHAI)-organised championship.
